query:
SELECT m.id AS message_id, m.user_id AS message_user_id, m.message_text, m.created_at, u.name AS user_name
            FROM chatician.messages AS m
            INNER JOIN chatician.channel_messages AS cm ON m.id = cm.message_id
            INNER JOIN chatician.users AS u ON m.user_id = u.id
            WHERE cm.channel_id = $1
            ORDER BY m.created_at ASC;
